document.full_text: toronto blue jays starting pitcher jo-jo reyes was in spectacular form attempting to secure his first win in 27 starts, but was let down by his bullpen as the houston astros rallied for a 5-2 win on friday.
document.title: blue jays bullpen blows jo-jo reyes' lead
lines_and_colors: toronto blue jays starting pitcher jo-jo reyes was in spectacular form attempting to secure his first win in 27 starts, but was let down by his bullpen as the houston astros rallied for a 5-2 win on friday.
